org.webcurator.core.store
Interface DigitalAssetStore

All Known Implementing Classes:
ArcDigitalAssetStoreService, DigitalAssetStoreSOAPClient
public interface DigitalAssetStore

The DigitalAssetStore interface is used by the WCT Core and WCT Harvest Agent to interact with the digital asset store component.

Author:
bbeaumont

Method Detail

getResource

java.io.File getResource(java.lang.String targetInstanceName,
                         int harvestResultNumber,
                         HarvestResourceDTO resource)
                         throws DigitalAssetStoreException
Retrieve a resource from the Digital Asset Store. The resource is returned as a SOAP attachment and written to disk for use. This is ideal for streaming large resources.

Parameters:
targetInstanceName - The OID of the target instance that the resource belongs to.
harvestResultNumber - The index of the harvest result, within the target instance, that contains the resource.
resource - The resource to retrieve.
Returns:
The resource, as a file.
Throws:
DigitalAssetStoreException - if there are any errors.

getSmallResource

byte[] getSmallResource(java.lang.String targetInstanceName,
                        int harvestResultNumber,
                        HarvestResourceDTO resource)
                        throws DigitalAssetStoreException
Retrieves a resource transferring it as a byte array, rather than as a SOAP attachment. This method is appropriate for small resources where streaming is not required. It has additional memory requirements, but has no file I/O.

Parameters:
targetInstanceName - The OID of the target instance that the resource belongs to.
harvestResultNumber - The index of the harvest result, within the target instance, that contains the resource.
resource - The resource to retrieve.
Returns:
The resource, as a file.
Throws:
DigitalAssetStoreException - if there are any errors.

getHeaders

org.apache.commons.httpclient.Header[] getHeaders(java.lang.String targetInstanceName,
                                                  int harvestResultNumber,
                                                  HarvestResourceDTO resource)
                                                  throws DigitalAssetStoreException
Retrieve the HTTP headers for a given resource.

Parameters:
targetInstanceName - The OID of the target instance that the resource belongs to.
harvestResultNumber - The index of the harvest result, within the target instance, that contains the resource.
resource - The resource for which to retrieve the headers.
Returns:
An array of HTTP Headers.
Throws:
DigitalAssetStoreException - if there are any errors.

save

void save(java.lang.String targetInstanceName,
          java.io.File[] files)
          throws DigitalAssetStoreException
Save an array of files to the digital asset store. The files are saved to the first harvest result, so this method should be used only for files coming directly from the Harvest Agent.

Parameters:
targetInstanceName - The OID of the target instance to save the files to.
files - An array of files to send to the asset store.
Throws:
DigitalAssetStoreException - if there are any errors.

save

void save(java.lang.String targetInstanceName,
          java.io.File file)
          throws DigitalAssetStoreException
Throws:
DigitalAssetStoreException

save

void save(java.lang.String targetInstanceName,
          java.lang.String directory,
          java.io.File[] files)
          throws DigitalAssetStoreException
Save an array of files to the digital asset store. The files are saved to the first harvest result, so this method should be used only for files coming directly from the Harvest Agent.

Parameters:
targetInstanceName - The OID of the target instance to save the files to.
directory - The subdirectory under the target instance directory to which to save the files.
files - An array of files to send to the asset store.
Throws:
DigitalAssetStoreException - if there are any errors.

save

void save(java.lang.String targetInstanceName,
          java.lang.String directory,
          java.io.File file)
          throws DigitalAssetStoreException
Throws:
DigitalAssetStoreException

copyAndPrune

HarvestResultDTO copyAndPrune(java.lang.String targetInstanceName,
                              int orgHarvestResultNum,
                              int newHarvestResultNum,
                              java.util.List<java.lang.String> urisToDelete,
                              java.util.List<HarvestResourceDTO> hrsToImport)
                              throws DigitalAssetStoreException
Create a new Harvest Result by pruning resources out of an existing harvest result.

Parameters:
targetInstanceName - The OID of the target instance to which the harvest results belong.
orgHarvestResultNum - The original harvest result number to prune.
newHarvestResultNum - The number for the new harvest result.
urisToDelete - A List of resource URIs that should be pruned.
urisToImport - A List of HarvestResource that should be imported.
Returns:
The HarvestResultDTO of the pruned harvest result.
Throws:
DigitalAssetStoreException - if any errors occur.

initiateIndexing

void initiateIndexing(ArcHarvestResultDTO harvestResult)
                      throws DigitalAssetStoreException
Initiate the indexing of a Harvest Result.

Parameters:
harvestResult - The DTO of the Harvest Result to be indexed.
Throws:
DigitalAssetStoreException

initiateRemoveIndexes

void initiateRemoveIndexes(ArcHarvestResultDTO harvestResult)
                           throws DigitalAssetStoreException
Initiate the removal of indexes of the given HarvestResult.

Parameters:
harvestResult - The HarvestResult to remove indexes for.
Throws:
DigitalAssetStoreException - if any errors occur.

checkIndexing

java.lang.Boolean checkIndexing(java.lang.Long harvestResultOid)
                                throws DigitalAssetStoreException
Check the indexing of a Harvest Result.

Parameters:
Long - harvestResultOid the harvest result to check
Returns:
true if the harvestResult is currently indexing.
Throws:
DigitalAssetStoreException

submitToArchive

void submitToArchive(java.lang.String targetInstanceOid,
                     java.lang.String SIP,
                     java.util.Map xAttributes,
                     int harvestNumber)
                     throws DigitalAssetStoreException
Submits a harvest result to the archive. This method will use a callback to send the unique identifier returned from the archive.

Parameters:
targetInstanceOid - The OID of the target instance.
SIP - The XML SIP file.
xAttributes - A Map of indexed attributes. This map may or may not be used by the archive adapter implementation.
harvestNumber - The number of the harvest result to submit.
Throws:
DigitalAssetStoreException - if any errors occur.

purge

void purge(java.lang.String[] targetInstanceNames)
           throws DigitalAssetStoreException
Purge all the data from the digital asset store for the target instances specified in the list of target instance names.

Parameters:
targetInstanceNames - the target instances to purge
Throws:
DigitalAssetStoreException - if any errors occur.

purgeAbortedTargetInstances

void purgeAbortedTargetInstances(java.lang.String[] targetInstanceNames)
                                 throws DigitalAssetStoreException
Purge all the data from the digital asset store for the target instances specified in the list of **aborted** target instance names.

Parameters:
targetInstanceNames - the target instances to purge
Throws:
DigitalAssetStoreException - if any errors occur.

getCustomDepositFormDetails

CustomDepositFormResultDTO getCustomDepositFormDetails(CustomDepositFormCriteriaDTO criteria)
                                                       throws DigitalAssetStoreException
Determine whether a custom deposit form is required to be shown before submitting a harvest to a specific digital asset store.

Parameters:
criteria - Provides parameters that are required for DAS to make this decision.
Returns:
The response DTO that indicates whether a custom form is required, and if so, the location/content of the custom form.
Throws:
java.lang.Exception - thrown if there is an error
DigitalAssetStoreException
